brief: Write a value to the a trace log
description: Write a value to a trace log.

parameters.description: This is the value that will be converted to its string representation and written the trace log. An undefined value is represented by '<undefined>'.
parameters.name: value

parameters.description: If this optional filter is false, nothing will be written to the trace log. The default is true.
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: This is an optional number between 1 and 8 that is appended to 'trace' to identify the trace log. The default is 1.
parameters.name: number
